element.name: Shield Bracing
element.supports: Fighting Style, Fighter, Paladin, Ranger, Gunslinger

description.p: You can now wield a two-handed melee weapon with a shield, but must brace it against the shield as a bonus action to attack with it or use any of it's properties.
